data.name: gollum
data.description: A microservice for programmatic access to precomputed synthetic spectral model grids in astronomy

evidence: README indicates network usage: "The goal of this repo is to provide a Python Application Programming Interface (API) to several different synthetic spectral models. `gollum` will be built on the astropy affiliated package [specutils"
